tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Very funny and entertaining teacher. He has a lot of experience and funny anecdotes he\'ll tell you about during class. The class itself is interesting, but I feel he does a poor job preparing you for the final exam (that is really hard). Other than that, you can finish with a decent grade if you score well on the other projects.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Excellent orateur, il est impossible de s\'endormir dans ses cours. Ce prof, est super dynamique. Soyez pr\xc3\xaats \xc3\xa0 vous le faire dire, si vous n\'avez pas la bonne r\xc3\xa9ponse ou bien r\xc3\xa9pondu \xc3\xa0 la question par un autre chemin...Takatakkk

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: C\'est le deuxi\xc3\xa8me meilleur prof que j\'ai eu depuis que suis \xc3\xa0 l\'UQAM. P\xc3\xa9dagogiquement il est bon, maitrise bien la mati\xc3\xa8re. Soucieux de la r\xc3\xa9ussite des \xc3\xa9tudiants. A l\'entendre parler, on dirait qu\'on va couler les examens. C\'est sa fa\xc3\xa7on de stimuler les \xc3\xa9tudiants. Je vous le recommande fortement.
